sentence.Network_cn: 派驻海外要求有相关的工作经验。

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 16th cent. (as a Scots legal term meaning 'legally pertinent'): from medieval Latin relevant- 'raising up', from Latin relevare

entry.tran: 相关的;相应的;有重要性的
entry.def: Something that is relevant to a situation or person is important or significant in that situation or to that person.

example.ex: We are trying to make politics more relevant to younger people.
example.tran: 我们试图使政治活动更加贴近年轻人。

example.ex: We have passed all relevant information on to the police.
example.tran: 我们已经把所有相关信息都告知了警方。

entry.def: The relevant thing of a particular kind is the one that is appropriate.

example.ex: Make sure you enclose all the relevant certificates.
example.tran: 要保证把所有相关证书都放在里面。

means.word_mean: 1. having a bearing on or connection with the subject at issue;

sentences.sentence: "the scientist corresponds with colleagues in order to learn about matters relevant to her own research"

stems_affixes.value_cn: 不相干的,离题的,与……不相干
stems_affixes.word_buile: ir不+relevant[adj.有关的,中肯的,相应的,实质性的]→adj.不相干的,离题的,与……不相干

stems_affixes.value_cn: 有关的,中肯的,相应的,实质性的
stems_affixes.word_buile: re再+lev举起,变轻+ant……的→再举起→有关的
elevate[v.举起,提拔,振奋,提升……的职位]+or器→n.电梯,升降机
lev举起,变轻+er表名词→举起[重东西]的东西
lever[n.杆,杠杆,手段,途径,工具]+age状态→n.杠杆作用
lev举起,变轻+ity表名词→n.轻率,轻浮
lev举起,变轻+y→提升[税]:to raise tax
al一再+lev举起,变轻+iate表动词→不断轻→减轻

stems_affixes.value_cn: 举起,提拔,振奋,提升……的职位
stems_affixes.word_buile: e出+lev举起,变轻+ate表动词→举出→升高
lev举起,变轻+it+ate表动词→使东西举起→升到空中
lev举起,变轻+y→提升[税]:to raise tax

Sentence.sentence: One additional advantage of the interactive digital textbook is that students can download relevant critical comments.
students can download relevant critical comments

Whether they experiment with three-year degrees, offer year-round classes, challenge the tenure system—or all of the above—universities are slowly realizing that to stay competitive and relevant they must adapt to a rapidly changing world.
Universities are increasingly aware that they must adapt to a rapidly changing world in order to stay competitive and relevant
Find more relevant information for their work.

sentences.en: Museums should have a more involved or relevant public role.
sentences.cn: 博物馆应起到进一步介入公众生活或更加举足轻重的社会作用。

sentences.en: This point is really relevant and we had better move on.
sentences.cn: 这一点至关重要, 我们还是接着谈吧。

sentences.en: These materials are relevant to the case.
sentences.cn: 这些材料与这案件有关。

sentences.en: Her appearance is not relevant to whether she can be a good teacher.
sentences.cn: 她的长相跟她能否当个好老师无关。

sentences.en: I don't think his remarks are relevant to our discussion.
sentences.cn: 我认为他的话不切我们的议题。

jushi.english: Museums should have a more involved or relevant public role.
jushi.chinese: 博物馆应扮演更深入或更相关的公众角色。

jushi.english: This point is really relevant and we had better move on.
jushi.chinese: 这一点至关重要,我们还是接着谈吧。

jushi.english: These materials are relevant to the case.
jushi.chinese: 这些材料与这案件有关。
